item.title: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025
item.description: Top News Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025 2 hours ago Indian stock markets ended positively on December 11, with Nifty 50 up 0.55% at 25,898.55 and Sensex rising 0.51% to 84,818.13. Market breadth was bullish with 2,597 advancing stocks out of 4,548 traded. Key buzzing stocks included InterGlobe Aviation, Biocon Biologics, and Kaynes Technology, driven by company-specific news and analyst actions.

item.title: Lasa Supergenerics Whole-time Director Prathmesh Chalke Resigns Effective December 31, 2025
item.description: Lasa Supergenerics Whole-time Director Prathmesh Chalke Resigns Effective December 31, 2025 8 minutes ago Lasa Supergenerics Limited announced the resignation of Whole-time Director Mr. Prathmesh Chalke (DIN: 11119348), effective December 31, 2025. The director confirmed no material reasons for resignation beyond those in his December 11, 2025 letter, expressing gratitude for his tenure and commitment to smooth transition. The company informed BSE and NSE in compliance with SEBI Regulation 30 requirements.

item.title: IVRCL Limited Reports Massive ₹90,260.62 Crore Loss in Q2 FY26 Amid Ongoing Liquidation Process
item.description: IVRCL Limited Reports Massive ₹90,260.62 Crore Loss in Q2 FY26 Amid Ongoing Liquidation Process 15 minutes ago IVRCL Limited reported a massive net loss of ₹90,260.62 crores for Q2 FY26, with six-month losses reaching ₹1,75,458.90 crores and accumulated losses of ₹22,29,367.76 crores. Operating under liquidation as a going concern since 2019, the company faces severe financial distress with borrowings of ₹23,92,494.25 crores and substantial finance costs. The failed auction process and ongoing legal challenges compound the company's difficulties, while auditors have issued disclaimer opinions citing multiple concerns including disputed receivables and investment valuations.

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 22 hours ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.
